meanings.definition: The act or instance of renouncing or giving up something.
meanings.sent1: Her renunciations of unhealthy habits led to a happier life.
meanings.sent2: The renunciations of his possessions surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: His renunciations of desserts were met with disbelief at the party.
meanings.sent4: The renunciations of his past mistakes paved the way for a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The monk's renunciations of worldly pleasures inspired many to seek inner peace.

meanings.definition: A formal declaration of abandonment or disownment.
meanings.sent1: The renunciations of his title shocked the royal court.
meanings.sent2: She submitted her renunciations of the family inheritance in writing.
meanings.sent3: His renunciations of his responsibilities were met with confusion by his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The renunciations of his allegiance to the old regime marked a turning point in history.
meanings.sent5: The renunciations of his former identity left him feeling liberated and unburdened.
